sentences.en: All particulars should be carefully checked and verified; nothing should be taken for granted.
sentences.cn: 所有细节都应仔细核实, 任何事都不能想当然.

sentences.en: Details are verified in guides and bibliographies, and checked against current holdings and orders.
sentences.cn: 细节要按照指南和目录校核, 还要核对现有的收藏和订购单.

sentences.en: Furthermore, the detailed recollections of visual awareness in this case were consistent with verified events.
sentences.cn: 此外，在这个案例中，视觉意识的细节回忆与已经证实的事件是一致的。

sentences.en: I verified the source from  which I had that information.
sentences.cn: 我核实了我所获消息的来源。

sentences.en: I verified the source from which I had that information.
sentences.cn: 我核实了我所获消息的来源。

sentences.en: Records were checked in and verified.
sentences.cn: 已作了记录并加以核对.

sentences.en: Subsequent events verified that his judgement was at fault.
sentences.cn: 接着发生的事件证实了他的判断有误.

sentences.en: Such simple and fully verified leading are certainly the originals and prototypes of the truth - process.
sentences.cn: 这类简单且得到完全证实的导向,肯定是真理过程的原型和标准.

sentences.en: The allegations of the plaintiff were verified by the testimony of the witnesses.
sentences.cn: 原告的指控由证人的证言获得证实.

sentences.en: The chauffeur started up and Marie verified the current.
sentences.cn: 司机开动发电机,玛丽调节电流.

sentences.en: The computer verified that / whether the data was loaded correctly.
sentences.cn: 计算机已查实数据输入[是否]正确.

sentences.en: The computer verified that the data was loaded correctly.
sentences.cn: 计算机已查实,数据输入正确.

sentences.en: The oil - bearing structure of the new oil field has been verified.
sentences.cn: 新油田的含油层结构已经探明.

sentences.en: The police verified that she had an airtight alibi.
sentences.cn: 警方查明她有着无懈可击的不在犯罪现场的证据.

sentences.en: The structure of the chain extender was defined and verified each other.
sentences.cn: 确定了该扩链剂的结构,各方法相互验证.

sentences.en: This report seems somewhat exaggerated, and should be verified.
sentences.cn: 这个报道有些水分, 需要核实.

words.tran_cn: 可证实的；能作证的；可检验的

trans.tran_cn: [计算机]检验( verify的过去式和过去分词)，证实，[军械]核查，查对
